svg.style: font-family:Lato, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, 'Liberation Sans', sans-serif;font-feature-settings:"liga", "kern", "calt", "lnum";text-rendering:geometricPrecision;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;font-size:18px;background-color:#ffffff

a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The number of wars divided by the number of all states. This accounts for the changing number of states over

time. Included are
intrastate wars
that were ongoing that year.
Data source: Correlates of War - Wars (2020); Correlates of War - State System Membership (2017)
